name: Nut Nut
description:
Nut Nut the 1930s cartoon runner game to go Nuts!

Play as Nut Nut, a cute little squirrel looking for nuts in a enchanted fore.. BANG! Oh fudge, Here's Big Bad Wolfgang. Run, jump and get nuts but watch out for the nutcases in the woods that buzz, chirp or thwack. The more nuts you get, the more nuts it will get!

Features:
- Hand-Drawn Cartoon Art style
- Rubber Hose Animation!
- Silly, funny Gameplay
- Unlock new modes (Black & White / Cinecolor)
- Play with only 1 finger!
- NO Ads and NO in-app purchases!

Allergic to Nuts?
No problem, try the NEW nut-free game GOODY GUMDROPS !
https://www.goodygumgames.com/

Follow us for more Nuts!
TWITTER: @NutNutGame
INSTAGRAM: @NutNutGame
FACEBOOK: @TheNutNutGame
